text: Les Misérables is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by J. Stuart Blackton and stars William V. Ranous, Maurice Costello, and Hazel Neason. ==Actors== * William V. Ranous as Javert * Maurice Costello as Jean Valjean * Hazel Neason * Marc McDermott ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1909 movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: Les Misérables (1909 movie)
